All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
addPhotoPopupController
Controller class for the Add Photo popup in the application.
addTagPopupController
Controller class for the Add Tag popup in the application.
addUserPopupController
Controller class for the Add User popup in the application.
Admin
The Admin class represents the administrator of the application and manages user-related operations.
adminController
Controller class for the admin functionalities in the application.
Album
The Album class represents a photo album containing a collection of photos.
albumController
Controller class for managing album views and interactions in a photo album application.
Controller
Abstract base controller class providing common functionalities like quitting, logging out, and showing alerts for different views in the application.
createAlbumPopupController
Controller class for the 'Create Album' popup in a photo management application.
homeController
The controller for the home view in a photo management application.
loginController
Controller class for handling the login functionality in a photo management application.
Photo
The Photo class represents a photograph with associated metadata, including path, caption, date, and tags.
Photos
The main class representing the Photos application, which extends the JavaFX Application.
photoViewerController
The photoViewerController class is a controller for the photo viewer window in the photo management system.
popupController
The popupController class is an abstract controller for handling pop-up windows in the photo management system.
searchOutputController
The searchOutputController class is a controller for displaying search results in the photo management system.
selectAlbumPopupController
The selectAlbumPopupController class is a controller for the album selection popup in the photo management system.
simplePhotoViewerController
The simplePhotoViewerController class is a controller for the simple photo viewer in the photo management system.
slideshowController
The slideshowController class is a controller for the slideshow view in the photo management system.
Tag
This class represents a tag for a photo.
User
The User class represents a user in the photo management system, storing albums and related functionality.
